ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then he showed him the Great Sign.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So he showed him the greater sign;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then Moses (went to Pharaoh and) showed him the Great Sign;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses showed him the great miracle
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So Moosa showed him a magnificent sign.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he showed him the great sign.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So he showed him the mighty sign.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So he showed him the great sign,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he showed him the tremendous token.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses showed him the great sign,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he shewed him the great sign.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then he showed him the greatest sign.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then did (Moses) show him the Great Sign.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then [Musa (Moses)] showed him the great sign (miracles).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He showed him the mighty sign,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He showed him the Greatest Miracle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he showed him the greatest sign,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:20] So he showed him the greatest sign, from among His nine signs, namely, the [glowing] hand or the [slithering] staff.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he) Moses (showed him the tremendous token) the hand and the staff.
